text: @AOC @AOC    Your full of shit.  Where’s the studies on Coronavirus with regard to race and socioeconomics? Don’t play the race card where it doesn’t apply.  You’re making yourself look foolish.  What’s next? Break out pitchforks and torches and storm the castle?
